sentences: Ta on alati olnud õiglane kohtunik.
See pole õiglane, et ta isakodust ilma jäi.
context: The Estonian word 'õiglane' is an adjective that means fair, just, or righteous. It can describe someone who treats everyone impartially and considers all circumstances, or something that is justified or has proper justification. In older usage, it could also mean pious or god-fearing.
